alert.note: Alert for Hardin; McNairy (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 09 at 2:51PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Tishomingo, northeastern Alcorn, southeastern McNairy and southern Hardin Counties through 330 PM CDT... At 251 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Shiloh, or 9 miles west of Pickwick Landing State Park, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Corinth, J P Coleman State Park, Pickwick Landing State Park, Pickwick Dam, Pineflat, Shiloh, Michie, Doskie, Pebble Hill, Hamburg, Bruton Branch, Tulu, Acton, Hurley, Red Sulphur Springs, Chambers, Counce, Lowryville, Damon and Southside. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
